取值区间：[ 200px, 浏览器可视宽度 ]，超出最值部分自动调整，支持百分比: Value range: [ 200px, browser visible width ], automatic adjustment for exceeding the maximum value, support for percentage
取值区间：[ 120px, 浏览器可视高度 ]，超出最值部分自动调整，支持百分比: Value range: [ 120px, browser visible height ], automatic adjustment for exceeding the maximum value, support for percentage
当值为布尔类型时，true 为显示默认的内容，false 为隐藏: When the value is of Boolean type, true displays the default content, and false hides it
当值为字符串或者 jsx 类型时，值即是显示的内容: When the value is a string or jsx type, the value is the displayed content
如果窗口预设尺寸不符合需求，可以尝试在对话框边缘处拖动，对话框提供了在二维平面上: If the preset size of the window does not meet the requirements, you can try dragging at the edge of the dialog box. The dialog box provides zoom-in and zoom-out operations on eight directions (including diagonals) in a two-dimensional plane.
或许你没有发现，界面实际上存在了两个对话框，你可以尝试按住头部移开上面的这个: Perhaps you may not have noticed, there are actually two dialog boxes on the interface. You can try holding down the top one and moving it away.
尝试点击另一个对话框，你会发现它们可以类似操作系统的窗口一样被聚焦: Try clicking on the other dialog box, and you will find that they can be focused like windows in an operating system.
你还可以通过双击头部或者扩展按钮实现全屏并固定，还原也是同样的操作: You can also achieve full-screen and fixation by double-clicking the header or expansion button, and the same applies to restoration.
如果你不想遮挡整块屏幕，你还可以尝试拖动至窗口左右边缘处实现半屏固定，如果拖拽至: If you don't want to block the entire screen, you can also try dragging to the left or right edges of the window to achieve half-screen fixation. Dragging to the top or bottom edges is equivalent to full-screen.
如果双手不想离开键盘，React-dialogbox 还提供了键盘事件，其中 e: If you don't want to leave the keyboard, React-dialogbox also provides keyboard events. Among them, esc stands for cancel event and enter stands for ok event.
React-dialogbox 还提供了收纳盒用来收纳被隐藏的对话框，你可以通过: React-dialogbox also provides a toolbox to store hidden dialog boxes. You can release them by clicking on the list in the toolbox.
api 生成的对话框将渲染在 Provider 容器内部: The dialog generated by API will be rendered inside the Provider container
如果已经引用 redux 或 mobx Provider，可以使用 as 替代名: If you have already referenced a redux or mobx Provider, you can use the 'as' alias and place the DialogboxProvider inside them
显示指定的对话框，如果它处于隐藏状态: Show the specified dialog if it is hidden
隐藏指定的对话框，如果它处于显示状态: Hide the specified dialog if it is displayed
通过实例的 close 方法关闭对话框（卸载）: Close the dialog through the close method of the instance (unmounting)
通过 closeDialogbox 函数关闭对话框: Close the dialog through the closeDialogbox function
openDialogbox 函数将打开一个新的对话框返回一个实例对象，可以通过组: The openDialogbox function will open a new dialog and return an instance object that can be cached through component properties
通过实例的 show 方法显示对话框: Show the dialog through the show method of the instance
通过 showDialogbox 函数显示对话框: Show the dialog through the showDialogbox function
通过实例的 hide 隐藏对话框（不卸载）: Hide the dialog through the hide method of the instance (without unmounting)
通过 hideDialogbox 函数隐藏对话框: Hide the dialog through the hideDialogbox function
是否允许点击阴影关闭: Whether to allow clicking on the shadow to close
为 Dialogbox 最外层元素添加额外的 className: Add additional className to the outermost element of the Dialogbox
初始时是否全屏: Whether to start in fullscreen mode
为 Dialogbox 的 header 添加额外的 style: Add additional style to the header of the Dialogbox
为 Dialogbox 的 body 添加额外的 style: Add additional style to the body of the Dialogbox
为 footer 添加额外的 style: Add additional style to the footer
是否是模态框（区别于非模态框）: Whether it is a modal box (distinct from non-modal boxes)
value = true 使用默认；= false 隐藏；自定义 footer: Value = true uses the default; = false hides it; customize the footer
自定义 ok 按钮内容: Customize the content of the OK button
自定义 cancel 按钮内容: Customize the content of the Cancel button
ok 按钮的回调事件: Callback event for the OK button
cancel 按钮的回调事件: Callback event for the Cancel button
关闭对话框时触发的钩子: Hook triggered when closing the dialog
全局 Dialogbox 的默认配置，会被单个 Dialogbox 属性覆盖，详: Default configuration for global Dialogbox, which can be overridden by individual Dialogbox properties. See Provider.Props.defaultOptions in the following text for details
收纳盒配置，详情见下文中的 Provider.Props.storageboxO: Storage box configuration. See Provider.Props.storageboxOptions in the following text for details
操作方式：点击时放大或是鼠标悬浮时放大: Operation mode: zoom in when clicked or when hovering over with the mouse
内容为空时是否可操作: Whether it is operable when empty
Dialogbox 最外层 fiber 对应的 DOM 元素: The outermost fiber DOM element corresponding to Dialogbox
对应的唯一 Id，可以用来关闭 Id 对应的对话框: The unique ID associated with the corresponding dialog can be used to close the dialog.
显示当前实例对应的的对话框，如果它处于隐藏状态: Show the dialog associated with the current instance if it is in a hidden state.
隐藏当前实例对应的的对话框，如果它处于显示状态: Hide the dialog associated with the current instance if it is in a displayed state.
关闭当前实例对应的的对话框: Close the dialog associated with the current instance.
